io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets

Class TextTable.Column

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ddimitrov.nuggets.TextTable.Column
  • Enclosing class:
    TextTable

    public static class TextTable.Column
extends Object
    Defines the formatting attributes for a single column of a table.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  TextTable.Column.Memento
      Memorizes the mutable fields of its enclosing class and restores them on TextTable.Column.Memento.restore() or TextTable.Column.Memento.close().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double alignment
      Alignment of the rendered value (0-left, 1-right, 0.5-center, 0.75-slightly rightish)
      @Nullable Object defaultValue
      Used if the row value is null.
      @NotNull Function<Object,String> formatter
      Function to convert from row values to string.
      boolean hidden
      Hidden columns will not be rendered, but their values can be accessed through TextTable.SiblingLookup.
      int index
      The index of the data row that should be displayed in this column.
      @NotNull String name
      The column name.
      int padding
      Padding to be left between the value and the column separator (measured in characters)
      @Nullable String rightBorder
      Optionally overrides the right border for the column.
      boolean virtual
      Virtual columns are skipped from the input data and the formatters are always passed the default value.
      int width
      The column width (measured in characters)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Column(@NotNull String name, int index)
      Construct a new column with specified name, taking data from the specified index.

      Convert a data value into string.
      @NotNull String toString() 
      @NotNull Function<Object,String> withSiblingLookup(BiFunction<Object,TextTable.SiblingLookup,String> siblingAwareFormatter)
      Creates formatters that are aware of the row number, can reference sibling values from the same row, or aggregates of all values in a column.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        @NotNull
public final @NotNull String name
        The column name.

      • index

        public final int index
        The index of the data row that should be displayed in this column. When you use a builder, this is managed automatically (auto-increment).

      • width

        public int width
        The column width (measured in characters)

      • rightBorder

        @Nullable
public @Nullable String rightBorder
        Optionally overrides the right border for the column. Can be changed per row. If the value is null, style.vertical() will be used.

      • padding

        public int padding
        Padding to be left between the value and the column separator (measured in characters)

      • alignment

        public double alignment
        Alignment of the rendered value (0-left, 1-right, 0.5-center, 0.75-slightly rightish)

      • formatter

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Function<Object,String> formatter
        Function to convert from row values to string. The formatter may change any of the mutable attributes of the column, impacting the rendering of the value (they will be reset for the next row).

      • hidden

        public boolean hidden
        Hidden columns will not be rendered, but their values can be accessed through TextTable.SiblingLookup.
        See Also:
        withSiblingLookup(BiFunction)

      • virtual

        public boolean virtual
        Virtual columns are skipped from the input data and the formatters are always passed the default value.

      • defaultValue

        @Nullable
public @Nullable Object defaultValue
        Used if the row value is null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Column

        public Column(@NotNull
              @NotNull String name,
              int index)
        Construct a new column with specified name, taking data from the specified index.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this column (will be used in the table header and as key for mapped columns)
        index - the index of the data value within a row

    • Method Detail

      • withSiblingLookup

        @NotNull
public @NotNull Function<Object,String> withSiblingLookup(BiFunction<Object,TextTable.SiblingLookup,String> siblingAwareFormatter)
        Creates formatters that are aware of the row number, can reference sibling values from the same row, or aggregates of all values in a column.
        Parameters:
        siblingAwareFormatter - a 2 argument function accepting the current value and sibling lookup, and returning formatted value,
        Returns:
        a normal formatter function.
        See Also:
        formatter

      • format

        @NotNull
 @Contract(pure=true)
protected @NotNull String format(@Nullable
                                                                @Nullable Object value)
        Convert a data value into string.
        Parameters:
        value - the input value (typically row[column.index])
        Returns:
        the formatted value (length should be less or equal to the column.width-column.padding)

        @Contract(pure=true)
 @NotNull
public @NotNull String toString()
        Overrides:
